titleStmt.title: SII 8.5: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 5. (A.R. No. 419 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALLS.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Iruṉilamaṭan=taiyum poṟceyappāvaiyuñ cirttaṉic ce yūḻi yuḷiṭaituṟaināṭu n=tuṭarvaṉaveli paṭar vaṉavāciyum cuḷḷiccūḻ matiḷ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟ karumuraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porukaṭa liḻattaraiyartam muṭiyum Āṅkavaṉ teviyar Oṅkeḻil muṭiyum muṉṉavarpakkaṟ ṟeṉṉavar vaitta cun=tara muṭiyum ḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Eṟi mayiṟ cūṭum kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻu muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatir velait tolperuṅ kāvaṟ pal paḻan=ti vuñ ceṟuviṟ ciṉavi lirupattorukāl Araicukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ melvarum cān=timattivaraṇ karuti Iruttitiya cempoṟ tiruttaku muṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika mucaṅkiyil mutukiṭṭoḷitta cayaciṅkaṉ Aḷap ṭum piṭiyal Iraṭṭapāṭi Eḻarai Ilak=kamum navanetikkulap perumalaikaḷum vikkiramavirar cakkarakoṭṭamum mutirpaṭavallai maturamaṇṭalamuṅ kāmiṭaivaḷaiy nāmaṇaikkoṇaiyum veñcilaivirar pañcappaḷḷiyum pācaṭaippaḻaṉa mācuṇitecamum Ayarvil vaṇkīrtti yātinakaravaiyiṟ can=tiraṉ tolkulat tin=tirarataṉai viḷaiyamark=kaḷattu k=kiḷaiyoṭum piṭittup palataṉattoṭu niṟai kulataṉak=kuvaiyuṅ kiṭṭaruñcerumiḷai Oṭṭaviṣaiyamum pūcurarcer nalkkocalaināṭu n=taṉmapālaṉai vemmuṉai yaḻittu vaṇṭuṟaicolait taṇṭaputtiyum Iraṇacūraṉai muraṇurat tāk=kit tik=kaṇaikirttit tak=kaṇaIlāṭamuṅ kovin=ta can=taṉ māviḻin=toṭa taṅkāta cāral vaṅkāḷatecamu n=toṭukaṭaṟ caṅkuvoṭṭal mahipālaṉai veñcamarviḷākat tañcuvittaruḷi Oṇṭiṟal yāṉaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramum nit
tippirak=kamum Ārttavaṉakanakarp porttoḻil vā toraṇamum moyttoḷir puṉaimaṇip putavamuṅ kaṉamaṇi k=katavamum niṟaicirvicaiyamu n=tuṟainir paṉṉaiyum vaṉmalaiyūreyiṟ ṟoṉmalaiyūrum Āḻkaṭa lakaḻcūḻ māyiruṭiṅkamuṅ kalaṅkā valviṉai Ilaṅkācopamum kāppuṟu niṟaipuṉal māp vilipaṅkamum viḷaippaintūṟu kalaittakkor pukaḻ talaittakkolamu n=titamāvalviṉai mātamaliṅkamuṅ kalāmutik kaṭun=tiṟal Ilāmutitecamu n=teṉakkalarpoḻil māṉakkavāramu n=toṭukaṭaṟ kāvaṟ kaṭumuraṭ kaṭāramu māpporu taṇṭāṟ k=koṇṭa k=kopparakesarivanmarāna Uṭaiyārr śrīrājentracoḻadevaṟk=ku yāṇṭu 10 6 Āṟāvatu jeyaṅk=koṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭukoṭṭattu nāṭṭu ciyapuramāṉa śrīparāntakaccaruppetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyoṅ kaiyeḻuttu . Eyilnāṭṭu nakaraṅ kāñcipurattu tiruk=kāraik=kāṭu maṭamuṭaiya tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭupiccan kaiyyā litdevarpaṇṭārattu yāṅkaḷ koṇṭukaṭava pon dhanma kaṭṭaḷai k=kallālt tuḷainiṟai pon nūṟṟuk=kaḻañcu Ippoṉ nūṟṟukkaḻañcum kaḻañcinvāy yāṇṭuvarai policai nel Arumoḻitevaṉmarak=kālāl Irukalamāka neṟceytu van=ta palicai nel Irunūṟṟuk=kalam Iṉnel lirunūṟṟuk=kalamum Īramum patarum vālum Ulkum varakkūliyum nāṅkaḷe paṭṭu tirukkāraik=kāṭuṭaiyār tirumuṟṟattey koṭuvan=tu In=ta stānamuṭaiyārvacam Āṇṭuṇvarai Ittevar paṇṭārattu Aḷan=tu taravu koḷvommākavum . mutaṟpoṉ koḷka veṉṟu collappeṟā tomākavum . Iṉneṟ ṟataṇṭa van=tār
Imanṟupāṭu Iṟuttum Innel Irunūṟṟu yāṇṭutoṟu maḷappatākavum . Iṉnelluk=ku virota niṉṟom kaṅkaiiṭaik=kumariIṭaic ceytār ceyta pāvattup paṭuvatākavum Ippāvappaṭṭu Inneṟ can=tirātittavaṟ Āṇṭutoṟum koṭuceṉṟu Aḷappatākac cilā muṟcollappaṭṭa ṭu ciyapuramāna śrīpirān=ta kacarupperupetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom . Ivarkaḷ paṇik=ka yeḻuti neṉ Ivvūr k=karaṇattāṉ nūṟṟuppatinaṟuvan vināyakaneṉ Ivai Eṉ neḻuttu Eṉṟum yāṇṭu 10 6vatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu maṇaiyiṟkoṭṭattup puricaiṉāṭṭu tiruvūṟalpuṟattuaparāyirttaccaruppetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyo ṅkaiyyeḻuttu . Eyiṟkoṭṭattu Eyilṉāṭṭu nakaraṅ kāñcipurattu tiruk=kārai k=kāṭumaṭamuṭaiya tirukkāraikkāṭṭupiccaṉ kaiyyāl Ittevaṟ śrīpaṇṭārattil yāṅkaḷ koṇṭukaṭaviya poṉ tanmakaṭṭaḷaik=kallāl tuḷainiṟai poṉ Aimpatiṉ kaḻaiñcu Ippoṉ Aimpatiṉ kaḻaiñcinuk=kum poṉ kaḻaiñcinuk=ku Āṇṭuvarai Arumoḻitevanmarakkālāl nel Irukalamāka neṟceytu van=ta nel nūṟṟukkalamum Iṉnel nūṟṟuk=kalamum Īramum patarum puḻutiyum Ulkum varak=kūliyum ṉāṅkaḷe paṭṭu tiruk=kāraik=kāṭuṭaiyār tirumuṟṟattuk=ke koṭuvan=tu In=ta stāṉamuṭaiyārvacam paṇṭārat taḷan=tu taravu koḷvatākavum . Immutaṟpoṉkoḷka veṉṟu collappeṟātomākavum .
puḷḷikuttuvik=kavum peṟātatākavum . Immaṉṟupāṭi nel nūṟṟuk=kalamum can=tirātittavaṟ Āṇṭutoṟu maḷappatākavum . Iṉṉe laḷappataṟku virotaniṉṟom keṅkaiiṭai k=kumariIṭaic ceytār ceyta pāvattiṟ paṭuvatākavum Ip pāvampaṭṭu miṉṉeṟ can=tarātittavaṟ Āṭṭāṇṭuto patākavum cilālekai ce colluppaṭi maṇaiyiṟkoṭṭakoṭṭattup puricaiṉāṭṭu tiruvūṟalpuṟattu Aparāyitaccaruppetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom . Ivarkaḷ paṇik=ka veḻutineṉ Ivvūr k=karaṇattāṉ taḷippaḷḷi k=kālakālaneṉ Ivai Eṉ neḻuttu Eṉṟum ....yāṇṭu 10 6 vātu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Eyiṟkoṭṭattu Eyilnāṭṭu brahmadeyam ciykaccipeṭṭu sabhaiyoṅ kaiyyeḻuttu . Ikkoṭṭattu Iṉnāṭṭu nakaraṅ kāñcipurattu tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭumaṭamuṭaiya mātevaṉ Uttamakitaṉāṉa tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭupiccaṉ kaiyyā littevar śrīpaṇṭārattu koṇṭukaṭava poṉ dharmmakaṭṭaḷaikallāl tuḷainiṟai pon nūṟṟuk=kaḻañcum Ippoṉ nūṟṟukaḻañcinuk=kum poṉ kaḻañcinuk=ku Āṭṭuvarai Arumoḻitevaṉmarak=kālaāl Irukalam neṟceytu van=ta nel Irunūṟṟuk=kalamum Īramum patarum vāliṭump pūuḻutiyum nik=ki Ulkum vārakkūliyum ṉāṅkaḷe paṭṭu tirukkāraikkāṭuṭaiyār tirumuṟṟattukke koṭuvan=tu stānamuṭaiyārvacam paṇṭārat taḷan=tu taravu koḷvatākavum . Immutaṟpoṉ koḷka veṉṟu collappeṟātatākavum . Iṉnellut taṇṭavan=tāṟku meykkaṇṭu coṟukuṭuppatākavum .
ṉel lirunūṟṟuk=kalamuñ can=tirātittavaṟ Āṇṭutoṟu maḷappatākavum . Iṉṉelluk=ku virotaniṉṟom kaṅkaiiṭai k=kumariIṭai ceytār ceyta pāvattilp paṭuvatākavum . Ippāvappaṭṭum Iṉṉeṟ can=tirātittavaṟ Āṭṭāṇṭu toṟum koṭuceṉṟu Aḷan=tukuṭuppatākavum cilālekaiceytu kuṭuttom . koṭṭattu brahmadeyam ciṟukac varkaḷ paṇikka veḻutineṉ Ivvūrk karaṇattāṉ puricainilaiyeṉ Ivai Eṉ neḻuttu ....yāṇṭu 10 6vatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Ūṟṟuk=kāṭṭukoṭṭattu Ūṟṟuk=kāṭṭunāṭṭu Uttamacoḻaccaruppetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyoṅ kaiyyeḻuttu . Eyiṟkoṭṭattu Eyilnāṭṭu ṉakaraṅ kāñcipurattu tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭu maṭamuṭaiya mātavaṉ Uttamakitaṉāna tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭu periyapiccaṉ kaiyyāl Ittevar śrīpaṇṭārattil yāṅkaḷ koṇṭukaṭava poṉ tanmakaṭṭaḷaik=kallālt tuḷainiṟai poṉ nūṟṟuk=kaḻañcu . Ippoṉ ṉūṟṟukkakaḻañmkoṇṭaparicāvatu . poṉ kaḻaiñcinuk=ku Āṇṭuvarai policai nellu Arumoḻitevanmarak=kālāl nel lirukalamāka neṟceytu van=ta nel lirunūṟṟuk=kalamumiṉnel Irunūṟṟuk=kalamum Īramum patarum vālum pūuḻutiyum nik=kiy Ulkum varakkūliyum ṉāṅkaḷe paṭṭu tiruk=kāraik=kāṭuṭaiyār tirumuṟṟatte koṭuvan=tu In=ta stāṉamuṭaiyārvacam Ittevar paṇṭārat taḷan=tu taravu koḷvatākavum . Immutaṟpoṉ koḷka veṉṟu collappeṟātitākavum . Iṉṉelluttaṇṭavan=tār
mākavum Immaṉṟupā ṭiṟuttu Innellu Irunūṟṟukkalamum can=tarātittavaṟ Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟu maḷappatākavum . Iṉnelluk=ku virota niṉṟom kaṅkaiIṭai k=kumariIṭai ceytār ceyta pāpattiṟ paṭuvatākavum. Ippāvappaṭṭumpa Iṉṉel cantrātityavaṟ Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟuṅ koṭuceṉṟu Arumoḻitevaṉ maḷantukuṭuppatākavum cilā tom muṟcollappaṭṭa Uttamacoḻacaruppetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom . Ivarkaḷ paṇippa Eḻutineṉ Ivvūr karaṇattān kumaracattita ṭaiyāṉ nālāyiravaneṉ Ivai En neḻuttu ....yāṇṭu 10 6Āvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu maṇaiyiṟkoṭṭattu kaṉṟūrnāṭṭu rumaḻalaimaṅkalattu sabhaiyoṅ kaiyyeḻuttu . Eyiṟkoṭṭattu Eyilnāṭṭunakaraṅ kāñcipurattut tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭu maṭamuṭaiyā n māteva ṉuttamakitaṉāṉa tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭu periyapiccaṉ kaiyyā littiruk=kāraik=kāṭuṭaiyār śrīpaṇṭārattil yāṅkaḷ koṇṭukaṭava poṉ taṉmakaṭṭaḷaik=kallālt tuḷainiṟai poṉ nūṟṟuk=kaḻañcu . Ippoṉ nūṟṟuk=kaḻañcuṅ koṇṭaparicāvatu . poṉ kaḻañciṉuk=ku Āṇṭuvarai policai Arumoḻitevaṉmarak=kālāl nel Irukalamāka neṟceytu Ippoṉ nūṟṟuk=kaḻañcuk=ku van=ta nel Irunūṟṟu k=kalam Innel Irunūṟṟu k=kalamum Īramum patarum vālum puḻutiyum nik=kiy Ulkum varakkūliyum ṉāṅkaḷey paṭṭut tiruk=kāraik=kāṭuṭaiyār tirumuṟṟattey koṭuvan=tu can=tirāti
tākavum . Itaṟtiṟampil dhanmāsanamutalākattāṉ veṇṭu kovukku nicatam kaḻañcupoṉ nāḷeṭuttu maṉṟap peṟuvatākavum . Immaṉṟupāṭu ceṉṟu niṉṟu maṟuk=kavum puḷḷikuttuvik=kavum peṟātomākavum . manṟupā ṭiṟuttum Innel Irunūṟṟukkalamum cantrādittaval Āṭ tākavum Innellukku vi Iṭaik kumariIṭaic ceytār ceyta pāvattiṟ paṭuvatākavum . Ippāvappaṭṭum Innellu Irunūṟṟu k=kalamum cantrātittaval Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟum koṭuvan=tu Arumoḻitevaṉmarak=kālāl Aḷan=tu kuṭuppatāka cilālekai ceytukuṭuttom muṟcollappaṭṭa bhaiyom paṇiyālivvūr k=karaṇattāṉ veṅkaṭavaṉ taṇiyaṉmalaiyeṉ Ivai Eṉ ṉeḻuttu .... muṉittevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 3Āvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu kāliyūrkoṭṭattu k=kāliyūrnāṭṭu Oriruk=kaiūroṅ kaiyyeḻuttu . Eyiṟkoṭṭattu nakaraṅ kāñcipurattut tiruk=kāraik=kāṭuṭaiyamahādevaṟku Arttayāmattuk=ku veṇṭum nivan=tattu In=ta stāna maṭamuṭaiya māteva ṉuttamakitaṉāṉa tiruk=kāraik=kāṭṭup periyapiccaṉ tevarpaṇṭārattil vaitta poṉ taṉmakaṭṭaḷaik=kallālt tuḷainiṟai poṉ patiṉaiṅkaḻañcu . Ik=kaḷattūrkoṭṭattut taṉiyūr maturān=takaccaruppetimaṅkalattu maturān=takacceri veṟpuṟattu k=kaṇṇaśanman vaitta taṉmakaṭṭaḷai k=kallālt tuḷainiṟai poṉ pa
nel k=kalane tūṇip patak=kup policaiyāka van=ta nel kalamum Idevaṟku yāṇṭu 104Āvatu meṟpaṭiūrom tiruk=kāraik=kāṭuṭaiyār śrīpaṇṭārattil Ātidāsaśaṇḍeśvararpak=kal Idevark=ku Iṟukka veṇṭum nivan=tattuk=kut tuḷainiṟai taṉmakaṭṭaḷaikallāl koṇṭa muppa tiṉkaḻañcukkum poṉ kaḻañcuk Arumoḻitevaṉmarakkālāl nel Irukalaṉe mukku muk=kuṟuṇi Āka neṟceytu van=ta nel Aṟupapatteḻu kalaṉe tūṇip patak=kum Āka nel nūṟṟorupattiru kalaṉe tūṇip patak=ku . Iṉṉel nūṟṟorupattiru kalaṉe tūṇippatak=kum Īramum patarum vālum puḻutiyum nik=ki Ulkum varak=kūliyum nāṅkaḷe paṭṭu stānamaṭamuṭaiyārvacam Ittevar śrīpaṇṭārattu Aḷan=tu taravu koḷvomākavum . Immutaṟ pon koḷka Enṟu collappeṟātomākavum . Iṉṉel taṇṭavan=tārkku meyk=kaṇṭu coṟu koṭuppatākavum . Itaṟtiṟampil dhanmāsanamutalāka tāṉ veṇṭu kovuk=ku nicatam Irukaḻañcu poṉ nāḷeṭuttu maṉṟappeṟuvatākavum . Immaṉṟupāṭu ceṉṟu niṉṟu maṟuk=kavum puḷḷikuttuvik=kavum peṟātatākavum . Immaṉ m Iṉṉel nūṟṟorupattiru kalaṉe can=tirātittaval Āṇṭu kavum . Innelluk=ku virotam niṉṟom kaṅkaiyiṭai kumariyiṭai ceytār ceyta pāvattiṟ paṭuvatākavum . Ippāvappaṭṭum Iṉnel can=tirātittaval Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟum koṭuvan=tu Aḷappatāka śilālekai ceytukuṭuttom muṟcollappa
A portion of the inscription was read from the stone. A few words are damaged.
Digital edition of SII 8.5 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
